english.segment1: the mistakes I've made. that caused pain. I could have done without
english.segment2: all my selfish thoughts. all my pride. the things I hid. you have forgot about
english.segment3: (chorus). they're all behind you. they'll never find you. they're on the ocean floor. your sins are forgotten. they're on the bottom. of the ocean floor
english.segment4: my misdeeds. all my greed. all the things that haunt me now. they're not a pretty sight to see. but they're wiped away. by a mighty, mighty wave. a mighty, mighty wave
english.segment6: your sins are erased. and they are no more. they're out on the ocean floor
english.segment7: take them away. to return no more. take them away. to the ocean floor. to the ocean floor. to the ocean floor
english.segment9: your sins are erased. and they are no more. they're out on the ocean floor
